#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mem(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
using namespace std;
const int maxn=1e5+5,inf=1e9+7;

double use[105]={0,1.000000000000,2.000000000000,2.666666666667,3.250000000000,3.800000000000,4.333333333333,4.857142857143,5.375000000000,5.888888888889,6.400000000000,6.909090909091,7.416666666667,7.923076923077,8.428571428571,8.933333333333,9.437500000000,9.941176470588,10.444444444444,10.947368421053,11.450000000000,11.952380952381,12.454545454545,12.956521739130,13.458333333333,13.960000000000,14.461538461538,14.962962962963,15.464285714286,15.965517241379,16.466666666667,16.967741935484,17.468750000000,17.969696969697,18.470588235294,18.971428571429,19.472222222222,19.972972972973,20.473684210526,20.974358974359,21.475000000000,21.975609756098,22.476190476190,22.976744186047,23.477272727273,23.977777777778,24.478260869565,24.978723404255,25.479166666667,25.979591836735,26.480000000000,26.980392156863,27.480769230769,27.981132075472,28.481481481481,28.981818181818,29.482142857143,29.982456140351,30.482758620690,30.983050847458,31.483333333333,31.983606557377,32.483870967742,32.984126984127,33.484375000000,33.984615384615,34.484848484848,34.985074626866,35.485294117647,35.985507246377,36.485714285714,36.985915492958,37.486111111111,37.986301369863,38.486486486486,38.986666666667,39.486842105263,39.987012987013,40.487179487179,40.987341772152,41.487500000000,41.987654320988,42.487804878049,42.987951807229,43.488095238095,43.988235294118,44.488372093023,44.988505747126,45.488636363636,45.988764044944,46.488888888889,46.989010989011,47.489130434783,47.989247311828,48.489361702128,48.989473684211,49.489583333333,49.989690721649,50.489795918367,50.989898989899,51.490000000000};

int main(void){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    ///for(int i=0;i<100;++i) cout<<use[i]<<' ';
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        cout<<fixed<<setprecision(12)<<use[n]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
